Ad.title: Advertisement
Ad.description: Represents an ad listing posted by a user.

description.description: The detailed description of the ad.

priceType.description: The pricing model for the ad.

price.description: The price of the item, if fixed.

location.description: The location associated with the ad.

images.description: A list of image URLs for the ad.

userId.description: The UID of the user who posted the ad.

userDisplayName.description: The display name of the user who posted the ad.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the ad was created.

status.description: The current status of the ad.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public profile information for each user.
